PACKAGE.NAME: APP_UTIL
PACKAGE.COMMENT:
Project: app_util
Description: This package will hold base methods for other packages, types, functions or produres.
Features:
   1. manipulate string
   2. manipulate table
   3. manipulate date and time
   4. manipulate dictionary
   5. manipulate transaction
   6. manipulate json
   7. manipulate package

RETURN.TYPE: table OF varchar2(4000) INDEX BY varchar2(64)

ARGUMENT.NAME: PI_RPAD_SIZE
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: Pading size, if ignore then using g_rpad_size(30)

TAG.COMMENT: pi_rpad_size Pading size, if ignore then using g_rpad_size(30)

ARGUMENT.NAME: PI_RPAD_SIZE
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: Pading size, if ignore then using g_rpad_size(30)

TAG.COMMENT: pi_rpad_size Pading size, if ignore then using g_rpad_size(30)

ARGUMENT.NAME: PI_RPAD_SIZE
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: Pading size, if ignore then using g_rpad_size(30)

TAG.COMMENT: pi_rpad_size Pading size, if ignore then using g_rpad_size(30)
pi_dictionary Pass dictionary, defined by app_util

ARGUMENT.NAME: PI_IS_PREVIEWED
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: If true then print, or do nothing

TAG.COMMENT: pi_is_previewed If true then print, or do nothing

RETURN.COMMENT: boolean. If true then the table exists

TAG.COMMENT: boolean. If true then the table exists

ARGUMENT.NAME: PI_IS_FORCED
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: Defaul false, if set true, this table will drop cascade

TAG.COMMENT: pi_table_name Pass table name to drop
pi_is_forced Defaul false, if set true, this table will drop cascade

FUNCTION.NAME: GET_DICTIONARY
FUNCTION.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Generate a dictionary from pljson type.
FUNCTION.COMMENT: Generate a dictionary from pljson type.

PROCEDURE.NAME: UPDATE_JSON
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Update pljson from another, only keys exist.
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Update pljson from another, only keys exist.

TAG.COMMENT: pio_json Pass pljson object to update
pi_json This is source to update

PROCEDURE.NAME: UPDATE_JSON
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Update pljson from a json string, only keys exist.
PROCEDURE.COMMENT: Update pljson from a json string, only keys exist.

ARGUMENT.NAME: PI_JSON
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: This is source string to update

TAG.COMMENT: pio_json Pass pljson object to update
pi_json This is source string to update

PACKAGE.NAME: APP_META_DATA
PACKAGE.COMMENT:
Project: app_util
Description: This package is used to config global config as default, which is able to be overrided by custom package.

FUNCTION.NAME: GET_OBJECT_NAME
FUNCTION.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Generate object string from global config by default.
FUNCTION.COMMENT: Generate object string from global config by default.

TAG.COMMENT: pi_prefix Pass prefix, default from g_prefix
pi_suffix Pass suffix, default from g_suffix

FUNCTION.NAME: GET_TABLE_NAME
FUNCTION.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Generate table name from global config.
FUNCTION.COMMENT: Generate table name from global config.

OBJECT_TYPE.NAME: APP_BASE_OBJECT
OBJECT_TYPE.COMMENT:
Project: app_util
Description: This type is base object for all suptype in this project, include private attributes, abstract methods and inherit methods.

PROCEDURE.NAME: INITIALIZE
PROCEDURE.COMMENT:
Abstract method.
Used to create constructor

PROCEDURE.NAME: GET_ATTRIBUTES_INFO
PROCEDURE.COMMENT:
Inherit method.
Store attributes info into __attributes__

PROCEDURE.NAME: PRINT
PROCEDURE.COMMENT:
Abstract method.
Print (no sort) all global attributes from __attributes__

PROCEDURE.NAME: PRINT
PROCEDURE.COMMENT:
Inherit method.
Print (sorted) all global attributes from __attributes__

OBJECT_TYPE.NAME: APP_CONFIG
OBJECT_TYPE.COMMENT:
Project: app_util
Description: This type is used to manipulate config from table, as private config.

VARIABLE.NAME: CONFIG_VALUE
VARIABLE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE: Get configuration from other sources.<br\> Ex: custom package, table, or default.<br\> Priority: high => low - User input - Custom package - Config table - Default<br\> Higher attributes will override lower ones.
VARIABLE.COMMENT: Get configuration from other sources.<br\> Ex: custom package, table, or default.<br\> Priority: high => low - User input - Custom package - Config table - Default<br\> Higher attributes will override lower ones.

OBJECT_TYPE.NAME: APP_EXTEND
OBJECT_TYPE.COMMENT:
Project: app_util
Description: This type extend time series to support logging, monitoring duration...

OBJECT_TYPE.NAME: APP_LOGGER
OBJECT_TYPE.COMMENT:
Project: app_util
Description: App tool for data management.

Project: app_util
Description: App tool for data management.

PACKAGE.NAME: APP_CONFIG_UTIL

PROCEDURE.NAME: GET_CONFIG

Project: app_util
Description: App tool for data management.

PACKAGE.NAME: APP_LOGGER_UTIL
PACKAGE.COMMENT:
Project: app_util
Description: This package is used to log application processes.

PROCEDURE.NAME: INITIALIZE
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE:
[table]
Create all tables for logging, for running process and tracking exception.
PROCEDURE.COMMENT:
[table]
Create all tables for logging, for running process and tracking exception.

ARGUMENT.NAME: PI_IS_FORCED
ARGUMENT.COMMENT: Pass true, drop and create table any way

TAG.COMMENT: pi_is_forced Pass true, drop and create table any way

PROCEDURE.NAME: INSERT_LOGGER_RUNNING
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE:
[table]
Update step and insert into table.
PROCEDURE.COMMENT:
[table]
Update step and insert into table.
Example: 
 begin
   app_logger_util.insert_logger_running('test name', 'test description');
 end;

PROCEDURE.NAME: INSERT_LOGGER_EXCEPTION
PROCEDURE.COMMENT_FIRST_LINE:
[table][anchor][exception]
Auto get exception and insert into table.
PROCEDURE.COMMENT:
[table][anchor][exception]
Auto get exception and insert into table.
